Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lafayette/91st
ShortDescription: Southbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 87th, King Drive and 95th: due to, street blockage near Lafayette/91st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 87th, King Drive and 95th: due to, street blockage near Lafayette/91st.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Belmont
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Belmont while we get help for a sick passenger. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Belmont while we get help for a sick passenger.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
